Key Match Events: The Celtics set the tone with 40 points in the first quarter to take an early 17-point lead
The Celtics went on a pivotal 7-0 run in the fourth quarter to pull away in the end
The Hornets exploded for 42 points in the second quarter to claw back from an early deficit
Pre-Game Insights: The Celtics have won 24 of their last 25 road games against opponents who are on the second leg of a back-to-back
The Hornets have lost each of their last eight games against Atlantic Division opponents that held a winning record
The Celtics have covered the spread in each of their last six games with both teams on the second leg of a back-to-back
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Celtics shot 47 percent from the field and 13 of 42 from the 3-point line
The Hornets shot 46 percent from the field and 19 of 48 from the 3-point line
Others: The Celtics are still missing a couple of key players with Kristaps Porzingis and Al Horford both out
The Hornets are coming in with a full squad once again
